attributes.action: debate on having a peoples vote so people can have the final say on Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
Vote Leave chief who created £350m NHS claim on bus admits leaving EU could be 'an error'.

Statistics Authority boss 'disappointed' at Boris Johnson's £350m NHS claim

British shop prices set for ‘severe, quick and significant’ increase due to Brexit, warns business group
attributes.background: i think this is important because there was a lot lies like for .e.g. the leave bus promised us £350 million a week which two politicians have said it's not possible to get that money.
